creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two blue satin panels attached in 2 places; heavy multi colored embroidery of flowers, birds and insects;  outer edge: red and gold metal; lower horizontal border with Chinese characters
medium: Silk, satin, gold metal thread, paper, cotton
title: Set of Two Embroidered Panels
